#define ADC_RANGECONV(data, y1, y2)   (((((int32_t)(data)) * ((y2) - (y1))) / ((1 << ADC_BITS) - 1)) + (y1))
 Macro used to convert data from adc range (0...(2 ^ADC_BITS - 1)) to y1 ...
